script:
Shannon   Anthony, are you OK?
Anthony   I'm OK now, but I got into an car accident this morning.
Shannon   Were you hurt?
Anthony   No, but my neck is still a little sore.
Shannon   What happened?
Anthony   I wasn't paying attention and I hit a car that stopped in front of me.
Shannon   Were the people in the other car all right?
Anthony   Yes, they're fine. I wasn't going very fast.
Shannon   Were you wearing a seatbelt?
Anthony   Yes.
Shannon   Did the police come?
Anthony   Yeah, I called them on my cell phone right after it happened.
Shannon   Do you want me to drive you home?
Anthony   No, I need to go get my car fixed this afternoon.
